Código-fonte para anysize_interface

from pylibCZIrw import czi as pyczi
from anysize_control import ImageController
import numpy as np



[documentos]
class AnySizeInterface():
    def __init__(self,image_path):
        self.original_name = image_path
        self.image_controller = ImageController()




[documentos]
    def setOriginalImageCrop(self,x,y,w,h,slice=0,channel=0,time=0):
        self.image_controller.setOriginalImageCrop(x,y,w,h,slice,channel,time)





[documentos]
    def cropOriginalImage(self):
        self.image_controller.cropOriginalImage(self.original_name)





[documentos]
    def setSubImageCrop(self,x,y,w,h):
        self.image_controller.setSubImageCrop(x,y,w,h)





[documentos]
    def cropSubImage(self):
        self.image_controller.cropSubImage()





[documentos]
    def getImage(self):
        return self.image_controller.getOriginalCropped()


    


[documentos]
    def getSubImage(self):
        return self.image_controller.getSubCropped()


        



[documentos]
    def getTopLeft(self):
        return self.image_controller.getTopLeft()
